title: APA aggregate charts: stroke color differentiation + connectNulls

requirements.summary: Update Recharts Line stroke colors (visual-only) in ApaAggregateCharts for the Trend and Match Results charts without changing any data logic.
acceptanceCriteria: PPI & aPPI Trend renders PPI in black (#000) and aPPI in blue (#2563eb), both with strokeWidth=2.
Match Results renders Your Points in black (#000), Opponent Points in blue (#2563eb), and Defensive Shots in purple (#7c3aed), all with strokeWidth=2.
No changes are made to data building (e.g., unifiedData), sorting, parsing, filtering, datapoints, averaging, regression, smoothing, or any backend code.

file_operations.description: Change only the specified <Line /> stroke values: set aPPI and Opponent Points to stroke="#2563eb" and Defensive Shots to stroke="#7c3aed" while keeping PPI and Your Points stroke="#000"; ensure strokeWidth remains {2} for all specified lines; do not alter any data keys, labels, or computations.

requirements.summary: Ensure all Recharts lines render continuously by enabling connectNulls for every Line in both charts in ApaAggregateCharts.
acceptanceCriteria: All five rendered `<Line />` components (PPI, aPPI, Your Points, Opponent Points, Defensive Shots) include `connectNulls={true}`.
Lines render continuously across null/missing values without breaking into segments.
No other behavioral changes are introduced outside this file.

file_operations.description: Add connectNulls={true} to each of the five existing Recharts <Line /> components in the PPI & aPPI Trend chart and the Match Results chart, without changing any other props, chart configuration, or non-visual logic.
